8th, 9th Jcmu-ary, 1699.— The Czar was dining with Prince Galizin, when a sudden tumult announced that a fire had broken out, and had already eon- sumed the house of a certain Boyar. The Czar, ex- eited at this, springing hastily from the table and running headlong to the place where he had heard the fire was raging, not only gave his advice, but ac- tually employed his own hands in putting out the flames, and was seen laboring away among the very mttering ruins of the house.
